recommendations: ⚠️ **Dataset Analysis**: 72.8% of samples are acidic (pH < 6.0). Your dataset shows mean pH of 5.61, indicating systematic acidity issues.
📊 **Pattern Found**: pH ranges from 3.00 to 9.00. Consider bulk lime application across 73% of affected areas.
🔗 **Correlation Insight**: pH shows strongest correlation with moisture (r=-0.566). Monitoring moisture can help predict pH changes.
🔴 **Dataset Analysis**: 100.0% of samples are in critical range (NHI < 30). Mean NHI of 3.31 indicates widespread nutrient deficiencies requiring immediate intervention.
📊 **NPK Imbalance**: Nitrogen represents 9.3% of total NPK (below ideal ~40%). Consider increasing N applications.
📊 **Vegetative Growth Stage** (72.2% of dataset): Avg N=6.8, P=34.3, K=30.1. Dataset shows 15235 samples in this stage.
📊 **Seedling  Stage** (27.8% of dataset): Avg N=5.6, P=33.0, K=28.7. Dataset shows 5863 samples in this stage.
🌱 **Dataset Pattern**: Vegetative Growth is the dominant stage (72.2% of samples). Focus nutrient management strategies on this stage's requirements.
